mapper.sql: select storeNo, storeName, managerId, itemName, price, itemCategory1, num, itemCategory2, itemCategory3, color, itemNo, size, count, detailNo from itemList
mapper.select: select distinct color from itemcontents where itemName=#{ itemName };
select distinct size from itemcontents where itemName=#{ itemName };
select Store.storeName, Store.storeNo from Store inner join StoreMember on Store.storeNo=StoreMember.storeNo where StoreMember.managerId=#{ managerId }
mapper.insert: insert into Item (storeNo, itemName, itemCategory1, itemCategory2, itemCategory3, price) values (#{storeNo}, #{itemName}, #{itemCategory1}, #{itemCategory2}, #{itemCategory3}, #{price})
insert into ItemColor ( color, itemNo, num ) values (#{ color }, #{ itemNo }, #{ num })
insert into itemDetail ( size, count, itemNo ) values (#{ size }, #{ count }, #{ itemNo })
insert into ImageTable ( imgSaveName, imageSize, imgOriName, num ) values (#{ imgSaveName }, #{ imageSize }, #{ imgOriName }, #{ num })
mapper.select: where storeName = #{storeName} order by detailNo ASC

where storeName=#{storeName} and
itemName like concat('%',#{itemName},'%')
itemNo like concat('%',#{itemNo},'%')
